org.jmisb.api.video

Class VideoOutputOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmisb.api.video.VideoOutputOptions

  • public class VideoOutputOptions
extends Object
    Options to be specified when opening an output file or stream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VideoOutputOptions(int width, int height)
      Construct with default values.
      VideoOutputOptions(int width, int height, int bitRate, double frameRate, int gopSize, boolean hasKlvStream)
      Deprecated. 
      Use constructor taking KlvFormat argument instead.
      VideoOutputOptions(int width, int height, int bitRate, double frameRate, int gopSize, KlvFormat multiplexingMethod)
      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VideoOutputOptions

        public VideoOutputOptions(int width,
                          int height)
        Construct with default values.
        Parameters:
        width - Video frame width, in pixels
        height - Video frame height, in pixels

      • VideoOutputOptions

        @Deprecated
public VideoOutputOptions(int width,
                                      int height,
                                      int bitRate,
                                      double frameRate,
                                      int gopSize,
                                      boolean hasKlvStream)
        Deprecated. Use constructor taking KlvFormat argument instead.
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        width - Video frame width, in pixels
        height - Video frame height, in pixels
        bitRate - Target stream bit rate in bits/second
        frameRate - Stream frame rate in frames/second
        gopSize - Group of Picture size, i.e., the I-frame interval
        hasKlvStream - True to include a (asynchronous) KLV data stream

      • VideoOutputOptions

        public VideoOutputOptions(int width,
                          int height,
                          int bitRate,
                          double frameRate,
                          int gopSize,
                          KlvFormat multiplexingMethod)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        width - Video frame width, in pixels
        height - Video frame height, in pixels
        bitRate - Target stream bit rate in bits/second
        frameRate - Stream frame rate in frames/second
        gopSize - Group of Picture size, i.e., the I-frame interval
        multiplexingMethod - the multiplexing method to use for KLV metadat (NoKlv to disable KLV)

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Get the image width.
        Returns:
        Width in pixels

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Get the image height.
        Returns:
        Height in pixels

        public int getBitRate()
        Get the stream bit rate.
        Returns:

      • getFrameRate

        public double getFrameRate()
        Get the stream frame rate.
        Returns:
        Frame rate in frames/second

      • getGopSize

        public int getGopSize()
        Get the Group of pictures (GOP) size.
        Returns:
        GOP size, i.e., the I-frame interval

      • hasKlvStream

        public boolean hasKlvStream()
        Check if the output has a KLV data stream.
        Returns:
        True if the output has a KLV stream

      • getMultiplexingMethod

        public KlvFormat getMultiplexingMethod()
        Get the KLV metadata multiplexing method.

        See ST 1402.2 Section 9.4 for more details.

        Returns:
        the multiplexing method (NoKlv if not included).
